{{title|iter_move{{small|(std::basic_const_iterator&lt;Iter&gt;)}}}}
{{cpp/iterator/basic_const_iterator/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr /*rvalue-reference*/
    iter_move( const basic_const_iterator&amp; i ) noexcept(/* see below */);
}}

Casts the result of dereferencing the underlying iterator to its associated const rvalue reference type.

The return type {{c|/*rvalue-reference*/}} is {{c|std::common_reference_t&lt;const std::iter_value_t&lt;Iter&gt;&amp;&amp;, std::iter_rvalue_reference_t&lt;Iter&gt;&gt;}}.

The function body is equivalent to&lt;br&gt;
{{c|1=return static_cast&lt;/*rvalue-reference*/&gt;(std::ranges::iter_move(i.base()));}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{c|std::basic_const_iterator&lt;Iter&gt;}}}}

===Parameter===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|a {{tt|basic_const_iterator}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
An rvalue reference to const, or a prvalue.

===Exceptions===
{{noexcept|noexcept(static_cast&lt;/*rvalue-reference*/&gt;(std::ranges::iter_move(i.base())))}}
